title: Looking for Gold/Plat ADC's climbing after placements Aggressive playstyles

embed.description: J0NESY / Bronze 2 0LP / 28W 32L Win Ratio 47% / Nautilus - 2W 6L Win Ratio 25%, Yorick - 2W 4L Win Ratio 33%, Morgana - 1W 4L Win Ratio 20%, Leona - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%, Soraka - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body:
Support main - Looking for ADC's to duo with prefer an aggressive play style with plenty of ping communication.

I am best with: Leona, Nautilus, Morgana, Lux & Swain.
Alternate roles are Yorick Top or Malph, Vi, Khaz jungle

Previous seasons I have been in Plat, currently in bronze 2 after some sketchy promos. last season i finished mid silver due to not playing much. 

Level 220+ account with all champions.
